name: Envs Switcher
author: Steeve Lefebvre

sections.description: Based on the class WordPress Stage Switcher Environments Switcher is a plugin that adds a button in your admin bar permetant to switch between three different preset environments: development, demonstration and production.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Logs Display to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Click Settings to add different url related to different envoronements your site.
  4. Looking to the right of alminbar vote, there should be a new button.
sections.changelog:
v 1.3.0

  • Adding Grouper Compatibility

v 1.2.0

  • Add test environment.
  • Fixed link management.
  • Removing multisite.

v 1.1.0

  • Add test environment.

v 1.0.0

  • First release!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Logs Display to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Click Settings to add different url related to different envoronements your site.
  4. Looking to the right of alminbar vote, there should be a new button.

short_description: Easily navigate between different environments of a same site.
description: Based on the class WordPress Stage Switcher Environments Switcher is a plugin that adds a button in your admin bar permetant to switch between three different preset environments: development, demonstration and production.
